name: Finance Blocks
description: Finance Blocks works as a Platform as a Service (PaaS) solution to Rural Financial Institutions through which they can digitize their banking process. Finance Blocks is backed by cutting-edge technology that enables institutions to provide seamless financial offerings to rural populations. Finance Blocks has integrated Polygon protocol and intends to push all information to the Ethereum Blockchain.The platform connects seamlessly with national identity systems and extends a secure repository for user identification data on the blockchain.
